name: Collateral Damage
description:
'Collateral Damage' is my entry for the 2014 Cyberpunk Jam.
It is a fast-paced 2D survival shooter in a cyberpunk setting about a rebel alliance trying to 'purify' the capital from its totalitarian oppressors.

But at what cost?

-- FEATURES

  • Fast-paced 2D action with different weapons
  • Smart enemy AI which will seek out cover and call for backup
  • Persistent cartoon violence and gore
  • A mayor with a beard which you get to shoot

-- CONTROLS

WASD to move.
'Z' to interact: pickup weapon drops and call in a gunship as air support.
You aim with the mouse and press the left mouse button to fire your weapon.
'F1' to switch to/from fullscreen.
'Esc' to exit the application.

EDIT: You automatically start regenerating health after you don't get hit for a few seconds. So find cover behind a pillar or a building and watch them life juices flow back.

Have fun!
